attributes.action: Grant the Sergeant who detained Bristol terrorist, a George Cross or Knighthood.
attributes.additional_details: It serve as an example in the celebratory age, who society values as real heroes.
attributes.background:
Society relies of everyday heroes. A perfect example being, the unarmed Sergeant who detained the Bristol terrorist. Preventing even more innocent people being hurt.
Least we could do to show our recognition and gratitude is, by awarding a George Cross and/Knighthood.

rejection.details: You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour at http://www.gov.uk/honours
